DOC.brief_summary: Axitinib dose titration (giving a higher dose of the drug above its standard starting dose) among certain patients may improve the response to treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Axitinib (AG-013736) With Or Without Dose Titration (Increase) In Patients With Kidney Cancer
DOC.criteria: metastatic renal cell carcinoma (kidney cancer) with clear cell component no prior systemic therapy (including no prior adjuvant or neoadjuvant) Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) Performance Status 01 Blood Pressure < or = 140/90mmHg brain/CNS metastasis using more than 2 blood pressure medications
DOC.keyword: axitinib or AG-013736 dose titration (increase) renal cell carcinoma
